function.description: Fetch all rows from a result as an array.

function.description: Convert associative array values into suitable for SQL statement.

function.name: pg_delete
function.description: Deletes records.

function.name: pg_execute
function.description: Sends a request to execute a prepared statement with given parameters, and waits for the result.

function.description: Fetches all rows in a particular result column as an array.

function.name: pg_fetch_assoc
function.description: Fetch a row as an associative array.

function.description: Returns the type ID (OID) for the corresponding field number.

function.description: Gets SQL NOTIFY message.

function.description: Gets the backend's process ID.

function.name: pg_insert
function.description: Insert array into table.

function.name: pg_meta_data
function.description: Get meta data for table.

function.name: pg_ping
function.description: Ping database connection.

function.name: pg_prepare
function.description: Submits a request to create a prepared statement with the given parameters, and waits for completion.

function.name: pg_query_params
function.description: Submits a command to the server and waits for the result, with the ability to pass parameters separately from the SQL command text.

function.name: pg_result_error_field
function.description: Returns an individual field of an error report.

function.name: pg_result_seek
function.description: Set internal row offset in result resource.

function.name: pg_select
function.description: Select records.

function.name: pg_send_execute
function.description: Sends a request to execute a prepared statement with given parameters, without waiting for the result(s).

function.name: pg_send_prepare
function.description: Sends a request to create a prepared statement with the given parameters, without waiting for completion.

function.name: pg_send_query_params
function.description: Submits a command and separate parameters to the server without waiting for the result(s).

function.name: pg_set_error_verbosity
function.description: Determines the verbosity of messages returned by pg_last_error() and pg_result_error().

function.name: pg_transaction_status
function.description: Returns the current in-transaction status of the server.

function.name: pg_unescape_bytea
function.description: Unescape binary for bytea type.

function.name: pg_update
function.description: Update table.

function.name: pg_version
function.description: Returns an array with client, protocol and server version (when available).
